verses.verse: אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭תְהַלֵּל <S%H1984><s%> Boast בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> not what a day מָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> not thyself of to morrow כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵ֝דַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> for thou knowest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> may bring forth יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> A day

יְהַלֶּלְךָ֣ <S%H1984><s%> praise זָ֣ר <S%H2114><s%> Let another man וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> your own פִ֑יךָ <S%H6310><s%> thee and not thine own mouth נָ֝כְרִ֗י <S%H5237><s%> a stranger וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> and not שְׂפָתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8193><s%> and not thine own lips

כֹּֽבֶד־ <S%H3514><s%> [is] heavy אֶ֭בֶן <S%H68><s%> A stone וְנֵ֣טֶל <S%H5192><s%> weighty הַח֑וֹל <S%H2344><s%> and the sand וְכַ֥עַס <S%H3708><s%> wrath אֱ֝וִ֗יל <S%H191><s%> but a fool's כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> [is] heavier מִשְּׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> than them both

אַכְזְרִיּ֣וּת <S%H395><s%> [is] cruel חֵ֭מָה <S%H2534><s%> Wrath וְשֶׁ֣טֶף <S%H7858><s%> [is] outrageous אָ֑ף <S%H639><s%> and anger וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who יַ֝עֲמֹד <S%H5975><s%> but who [is] able to stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before קִנְאָֽה׃ <S%H7068><s%> envy
ט֭וֹבָה <S%H2896><s%> [is] better תּוֹכַ֣חַת <S%H8433><s%> rebuke מְגֻלָּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Open מֵֽאַהֲבָ֥ה <S%H160><s%> love מְסֻתָּֽרֶת׃ <S%H5641><s%> than secret

נֶ֭אֱמָנִים <S%H539><s%> Faithful פִּצְעֵ֣י <S%H6482><s%> [are] the wounds אוֹהֵ֑ב <S%H157><s%> of a friend וְ֝נַעְתָּר֗וֹת <S%H6280><s%> [are] deceitful נְשִׁיק֥וֹת <S%H5390><s%> but the kisses שׂוֹנֵֽא׃ <S%H8130><s%> of an enemy

נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul שְׂ֭בֵעָה <S%H7649><s%> The full תָּב֣וּס <S%H947><s%> loatheth נֹ֑פֶת <S%H5317><s%> an honeycomb וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul רְ֝עֵבָ֗ה <S%H7457><s%> but to the hungry כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מַ֥ר <S%H4751><s%> every bitter thing מָתֽוֹק׃ <S%H4966><s%> is sweet

כְּ֭צִפּוֹר <S%H6833><s%> As a bird נוֹדֶ֣דֶת <S%H5074><s%> that wandereth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from קִנָּ֑הּ <S%H7064><s%> from her nest כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> So אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so [is] a man נוֹדֵ֥ד <S%H5074><s%> that wandereth מִמְּקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> from his place

שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> Ointment וּ֭קְטֹרֶת <S%H7004><s%> and perfume יְשַׂמַּֽח־ <S%H8055><s%> rejoice לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart וּמֶ֥תֶק <S%H4986><s%> so [doth] the sweetness רֵ֝עֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> of a man's friend מֵֽעֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> counsel נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> by hearty

רֵֽעֲךָ֨ <S%H7453><s%> Thine own friend [וְרֵעֶה כ] (וְרֵ֪עַ <S%H7463><s%> friend ק) אָבִ֡יךָ <S%H1><s%> and thy father's אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲזֹ֗ב <S%H5800><s%> forsake וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָחִ֗יךָ <S%H251><s%> into thy brother's אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֭בוֹא <S%H935><s%> not neither go בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אֵידֶ֑ךָ <S%H343><s%> of thy calamity ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [for] better שָׁכֵ֥ן <S%H7934><s%> [is] a neighbour קָ֝ר֗וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [that is] near מֵאָ֥ח <S%H251><s%> than a brother רָחֽוֹק׃ <S%H7350><s%> far off

חֲכַ֣ם <S%H2449><s%> be wise בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son וְשַׂמַּ֣ח <S%H8056><s%> glad לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> and make my heart וְאָשִׁ֖יבָה <S%H7725><s%> break חֹרְפִ֣י <S%H2778><s%> him that reproacheth דָבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> act

עָר֤וּם <S%H6175><s%> A prudent רָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> [man] foreseeth רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> the evil נִסְתָּ֑ר <S%H5641><s%> [and] hideth פְּ֝תָאיִ֗ם <S%H6612><s%> himself [but] the simple עָבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> pass on נֶעֱנָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H6064><s%> [and] are punished

קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take בִּ֭גְדוֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when עָ֣רַב <S%H6148><s%> that is surety זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> for a stranger וּבְעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> and for נָכְרִיָּ֣ה <S%H5237><s%> of him for a strange woman חַבְלֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2254><s%> and take a pledge

מְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> He that blesseth רֵעֵ֨הוּ ׀ <S%H7453><s%> his friend בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּ֭דוֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning הַשְׁכֵּ֑ים <S%H7925><s%> rising early קְ֝לָלָ֗ה <S%H7045><s%> a curse תֵּחָ֥שֶׁב <S%H2803><s%> it shall be counted לֽוֹ׃

דֶּ֣לֶף <S%H1812><s%> dropping ט֭וֹרֵד <S%H2956><s%> A continual בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day סַגְרִ֑יר <S%H5464><s%> in a very rainy וְאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) נִשְׁתָּוָֽה׃ <S%H7737><s%> are alike

צֹפְנֶ֥יהָ <S%H6845><s%> Whosoever hideth צָֽפַן־ <S%H6845><s%> her hideth ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and the ointment יְמִינ֣וֹ <S%H3225><s%> of his right hand יִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> [which] bewrayeth

בַּרְזֶ֣ל <S%H1270><s%> Iron בְּבַרְזֶ֣ל <S%H1270><s%> iron יָ֑חַד <S%H2300><s%> sharpeneth וְ֝אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so a man יַ֣חַד <S%H2300><s%> sharpeneth פְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> the countenance רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> of his friend

נֹצֵ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> Whoso keepeth תְּ֭אֵנָה <S%H8384><s%> the fig tree יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat פִּרְיָ֑הּ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> thereof so he that waiteth אֲדֹנָ֣יו <S%H113><s%> on his master יְכֻבָּֽד׃ <S%H3513><s%> shall be honoured

כַּ֭מַּיִם <S%H4325><s%> As in water הַפָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> face לַפָּנִ֑ים <S%H6440><s%> [answereth] to face כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> So לֵֽב־ <S%H3820><s%> so the heart הָ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man לָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> to man

שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> Hell [וַאֲבַדֹּה כ] (וַ֭אֲבַדֹּו <S%H10><s%> destruction ק) לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are never תִשְׂבַּ֑עְנָה <S%H7646><s%> full וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> so the eyes הָ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִשְׂבַּֽעְנָה׃ <S%H7646><s%> are never satisfied

מַצְרֵ֣ף <S%H4715><s%> [As] the fining pot לַ֭כֶּסֶף <S%H3701><s%> for silver וְכ֣וּר <S%H3564><s%> and the furnace לַזָּהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> for gold וְ֝אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so [is] a man לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> to מַהֲלָלֽוֹ׃ <S%H4110><s%> his praise

אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> Though תִּכְתּֽוֹשׁ־ <S%H3806><s%> Though thou shouldest bray אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱוִ֨יל ׀ <S%H191><s%> a fool בַּֽמַּכְתֵּ֡שׁ <S%H4388><s%> in a mortar בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among הָ֭רִיפוֹת <S%H7383><s%> wheat בַּֽעֱלִ֑י <S%H5940><s%> with a pestle לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> depart מֵ֝עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and אִוַּלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H200><s%> [yet] will not his foolishness פ

יָדֹ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> Be thou diligent תֵּ֭דַע <S%H3045><s%> to know פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the state צֹאנֶ֑ךָ <S%H6629><s%> of thy flocks שִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> [and] look לִ֝בְּךָ֗ <S%H3820><s%> well לַעֲדָרִֽים׃ <S%H5739><s%> to thy herds

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [are] not for ever חֹ֑סֶן <S%H2633><s%> For riches וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> Nor נֵ֝֗זֶר <S%H5145><s%> and doth the crown לְד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [endure] to every [דֹור כ] (וָדֹֽור׃ <S%H1755><s%> all ק)

גָּלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> appeareth חָ֭צִיר <S%H2682><s%> The hay וְנִרְאָה־ <S%H7200><s%> sheweth דֶ֑שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> and the tender grass וְ֝נֶאֶסְפ֗וּ <S%H622><s%> are gathered עִשְּׂב֥וֹת <S%H6212><s%> itself and herbs הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains

כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> The lambs לִלְבוּשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H3830><s%> [are] for thy clothing וּמְחִ֥יר <S%H4242><s%> [are] the price שָׂ֝דֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field עַתּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H6260><s%> and the goats

וְדֵ֤י ׀ <S%H1767><s%> enough חֲלֵ֬ב <S%H2461><s%> milk עִזִּ֗ים <S%H5795><s%> And [thou shalt have] goats' לְֽ֭לַחְמְךָ <S%H3899><s%> for thy food לְלֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> for the food בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thy household וְ֝חַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> and [for] the maintenance לְנַעֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5291><s%> for thy maidens
